name: Growth AI
bio: n8n automation expert eliminating repetitive tasks for businesses. Specializing in native API integrations (HubSpot, Pipedrive, Notion, Gmail, Slack) with custom workflows tailored to your tech stack. GDPR-compliant European hosting with AI agents.
